Sentencas: Metal-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (MS-SOFCs) have gained significant interest due to their potential advantages (low-cost, tolerance to redox and thermal cycling, robust and manufacturing) over conventional fuel cells.
Titulo: Characterization of Stainless-Steel Grids Dedicated to Cost-Effective Metal-Supported IT-SOFC

Sentencas: This work focuses on studying corrosion and electrical conductivity of porous metallic supports (stainless steel 316L and FeCrAl alloy) under different temperatures and atmospheres considering physical, chemical and electrical characterizations.
Titulo: Characterization of Stainless-Steel Grids Dedicated to Cost-Effective Metal-Supported IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Within the studied operating temperature range (500 degrees C-700 degrees C), the FeCrAl support resists to corrosion under air and H-2.
Titulo: Characterization of Stainless-Steel Grids Dedicated to Cost-Effective Metal-Supported IT-SOFC

Sentencas: At temperatures higher than 700 degrees C it forms a layer of alumina.
Titulo: Characterization of Stainless-Steel Grids Dedicated to Cost-Effective Metal-Supported IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The FeCrAl resistivity generally remains stable under H-2 and slowly increases under air.
Titulo: Characterization of Stainless-Steel Grids Dedicated to Cost-Effective Metal-Supported IT-SOFC

Sentencas: In contrast, the 316L support is only stable at 500 degrees C under air and at 500 degrees C and 600 degrees C under H-2.
Titulo: Characterization of Stainless-Steel Grids Dedicated to Cost-Effective Metal-Supported IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Above these temperatures, the 316L support shows severe corrosion.
Titulo: Characterization of Stainless-Steel Grids Dedicated to Cost-Effective Metal-Supported IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The resistivity is stable up to 600 degrees C, increases strongly for the support under air and slightly for the support under H-2 with the temperature increase.
Titulo: Characterization of Stainless-Steel Grids Dedicated to Cost-Effective Metal-Supported IT-SOFC
